image.caption: Brand Analysis - TeliaSonera family tree explains its brand image varies with regions and countries.
Consumer Trend Research - mainly focus on experience economy and emerging marketing tactics
User Study 1 - Interview Interviews were conducted in the business class lounge to find out our target users' expections at the airport.
User Study 2 - Observation Our target users were observed to be constantly on the phone.

User Study 3 - Problem Identification While business-class lounges have already satisfied most of business traveler's needs, business travelers who fly with economic class are disastified in the public waiting area.
